message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, especially considering its worth to someone in your position.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
